TopicTitle: VAB - when adjusting staging, have thin lines connecting stage element and list item

Articles.Content:
When putting together a particularly impressive rocket with multiple stages, could it be possible to have a brief line connecting the stage element (de-coupler, motor, etc) and the staging tree on mouse over?

Sometimes it can be difficult to see the highlighted stage element when mousing over the stage tree.

Thoughts?

Support, I hate having to look overhead or zoom in so that my camera clips through fuel tanks so that I can see which radial decoupler is highlighted. This suggestion is very simple and very important! Let's see it implemented!
